title: Chapter 4368 - Chapter 4368: 4367 All-Out War, Universe War! 6
body:
Chapter 4368 - Chapter 4368: 4367 All-Out War, Universe War! 6

Chapter 4368: 4367 all-out War, Universe War! 6

Translator: 549690339

Universe wars were often very cruel.

One side would invade, and the other side wouldn’t give up on the universe and escape until the final decision was made.

Because once they escaped, the entire universe would be dug up.

This was the same principle as killing your entire family and then digging up your ancestor’s grave.

As long as there was some blood, they would definitely fight to the death.

When the Heaven’s Gate Duke saw the army of the nine-origin universe, his expression was abnormally ugly.

“All Disciples of the Void Empire, Get Ready!”

“Get ready for a big battle. Anyone who dares to invade our void universe will become a dead soul under our hands!”

Duke Tian men roared with a face full of killing intent. His expression was filled with Ling ran and fearlessness.

“Yes!”

In the Void Empire, all the powerful disciples immediately responded loudly.

All the legions guarding the palace came to the front of the palace.

They stared at the nine-origin Universe Legion that was charging over.

At the same time, the legions from other places quickly teleported over.

A great battle was about to break out at any moment.

“What? The nine-origin universe has actually invaded the front of the dynasty, there are more than 20 heaven origin creation-level existences?”

At the same time, in the vast starry sky of the Void Universe.

The void King was quickly fleeing forward.

At this moment, when he received the message from his subordinates, his face revealed an extremely shocked expression.

The Army of the nine-origin universe had actually invaded the center of his universe.

To the king of Void, the entire void universe was his personal domain.

Now, it had actually been invaded.

This made him extremely shocked and furious.

“There are more than 20 powerhouses in the Heaven’s origin realm. How can there be so many powerhouses in this nine-origin universe? There must be powerhouses from other universes helping them. Damn it.”

The king of void trembled as he swept his gaze behind him.

He wanted to shake off the pursuit of Wang Xian and the rest. However, after teleporting a few times, he realized that he could not do it.

The Void Pagoda was severely injured by Wang Xian’s Dragon Claw while the void disk was suppressed by Wang Xian.

The king of Void’s current strength was equivalent to a great dao level, an existence at the beginner level.

His strength was the same as the Demonic Fiend Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor!

In addition, Wang Xian’s strength was much stronger than the king of Void’s.

With the three of them combined, even if the king of Void’s spatial attribute was good at escaping, he wouldn’t be able to shake them off.

Most importantly, the king of Void had just revived and didn’t have any treasures in his hands.

Even the treasure that could allow him to escape instantly didn’t have any.

He placed a portion of the resources in the space of the void disk.

The other portion was at the Palace of the dynasty!

“Damn it!”

He was a little shocked and angry, but at this moment, he could only flee!

Wang Xian and the rest were at the back. They were also chasing after the king of void rapidly, not giving him a chance to catch his breath.

“Dragon King, the Army of our nine-origin universe has arrived at the center of the Void Universe.”

At this moment, the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor got the information from his subordinate and said excitedly.

“Yes.”

Wang Xian nodded. He already knew about this news.

“Dragon King, now we only need to hunt down the king of Void. We will be able to completely destroy the Void Universe.”

The Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor stared at the figure of the King of void with a grim gaze.

“Do you have any way to catch up to him or pin him down?”

Wang Xian asked him and Mo Sha.

“Dragon King, I have no way. The distance is too far. I can’t pin him down.”

Mo Sha shook his head.

The Shadow Devil Emperor also shook his head helplessly.

At this moment, unless the king of void paused for a moment, it would be difficult for them to stop him.

“Then let’s wait. We Can’t lose him. Once we lose him, it will be much more difficult to kill him in the future.”

Wang Xian spoke.

He had to wait until the Netherworld Dragon’s pursuit could be used.

Now, he had already forcefully used the Netherworld Dragon’s pursuit once. Once he used it again, he would be heavily injured.

At that time, the three of them working together might not be able to kill the king of Void again.

Therefore, he had to wait for at least a year!

Fortunately, a year was not a long time for them.

Wang Xian and the rest were chasing after him rapidly.

The King of Void was also eager to return to the dynasty palace.

He wanted to see the current situation.

However, it would take at least a few decades to fly from here to the center of the Void Universe.

While Wang Xian and the rest were chasing after them, the war between the nine-origin universe and the Void Universe had already erupted!

All the heaven-origin creation realm powerhouses in the Void universe rushed back immediately after they received the news that their universe had been attacked.

There were a total of eleven heaven-origin creation realm powerhouses. After facing more than twenty heaven-origin creation realm powerhouses in the nine-origin universe, they were not qualified to fight head-on.

They activated a defensive array in the palace of the entire dynasty.

The 11 heaven origin creation realm experts and all the disciples went into defense.

One side attacked while the other defended.

The earth-shattering might was endless!

“HMPH, with their defense, they can only last for a few years at most.”

At this moment, the advantage of the space attribute was revealed.

Cultivators of the space attribute in the Void universe who had just broken through were comparable to old-timers like the Hetian saint.

The Hetian saint was here because he did not have the support of the Heavenly Yuan Destiny Supreme Treasure, which meant that he had the combat strength of an old-timer who had just entered the beginner-level.

Old-timers who had just entered the Heavenly Yuan Destiny Void universe were comparable to those at the control level.

In addition to the defense of the dynasty’s palace array, they were able to hold on for a while.

However, this support was only for a short period of time.

According to the calculations of the 12 ancestral warlocks, they would not be able to hold on for more than two years.

After all, their strength was much, much stronger!

Previously, a large number of void dynasty’s disciples in the ruler realm were killed by Wang Xian and had yet to recover.

“Demonic Fiend, Fallen Shadow Demonic Emperor, I have a move that I can use now. Get Ready!”

A lot of time passed in the past year.

Wang Xian and the rest shuttled through the spatial rift rapidly.

In front of them was the figure of the king of Void.

As time passed, the ability of the Netherworld Dragon to chase could be used again!

Devil Fiend and Fallen Shadow Devil Emperor were beside Wang Yun. They nodded at the same time.

Buzz

In the next instant, Wang Xian opened the black hole that the Netherworld Dragon was chasing after.

A black hole immediately appeared beside the king of Void.

“Not good!”

When the king of Void sensed this black hole, his expression changed drastically.

He had already experienced this black hole.

It was able to appear beside him in an instant.

“Roar Roar!”

“TSK TSK tsk, King of Void, you can’t escape. Be obedient and accept your death!”

Wang Xian and the rest’s roars and cold voices rang out.

This caused the king of the Void’s heart to sink.

The trump cards of three people were much more than the trump cards of him alone.

He was in danger.
